itunes:title: Do Not Fear Week 3 with Scarlet Hiltibidal
title: Do Not Fear Week 3 with Scarlet Hiltibidal
description:
For the third and final week of Do Not Fear, Raechel and Amanda welcome author and speaker Scarlet Hiltibidal back to the podcast. They revisit narratives from the Bible that required God’s people to look to Him in the face of fear. from Moses’s burning-bush encounter with God to the woman with the issue of blood being healed by Jesus. Join them as they discuss what it means to trust and remember God’s goodness and faithfulness especially in the hard seasons of life.


Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 3 of the She Reads Truth Title reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the Do Not Fear collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/do-not-fear-week-3-with-scarlet-hiltibidal
